title: Cognitive Load Prediction-Based Science Class Design Workshop for Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Collaborative learning theory, cognitive load theory, foundational neuroscience concepts, and basic machine learning principles
context.additional_context: Professional development program targeting pre-service and in-service secondary science teachers, aiming to optimize cognitive load in collaborative learning activity design

learning_goals: Analyze physiological indicators (fNIRS, eye-tracking data) to predict cognitive load levels when designing collaborative learning tasks
Visualize learner-specific cognitive load patterns and generate interpretive reports using machine learning models
Apply cognitive load prediction model results to propose optimized learning environments in science collaborative lesson design

resources: Random Forest-based predictive model demonstration system

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
